articles.description: PHILLIP SCHOFIELD - who is a host on This Morning alongside Holly Willoughby - has addressed his major 'c**k-up' amid an on-screen blunder on the ITV daytime show.

articles.author: Simon Meechan
articles.title: Odeon confirms when Silverlink, MetroCentre and Durham cinemas will reopen - Chronicle Live
articles.description: There will be unoccupied seats between customers and extra cleaning in place to make cinemas in Durham, Silverlink and the MetroCentre Covid-19 safe
articles.content:
Odeon cinemas in the North East will reopen from July 4.
The cinema chain has confirmed 'comprehensive new measures' will be in place to make its picture houses Covid-19 safe.
